article_title: 3 Reasons Why North Carolina Lawmakers Should Repeal CON

article_metadata.description: After an 80-day extension costing taxpayers well over $1 million, the North Carolina General Assembly has finally passed a budget with a price tag of roughly $22 billion -- a fiscally conservative budget considering that spending increased by only 3.1 percent which equates to less than the combined growth of [...]
article_metadata.author: Katherine Restrepo
